articles.title: Amanpour: I've covered repressive regimes but I've never seen this - CNN Video
articles.description: CNN Chief International Anchor Christiane Amanpour tells CNN's Jim Sciutto and Clarissa Ward about the reaction from world leaders to the US Supreme Court's decision to overturn Roe v. Wade.

articles.title: Ex-Trump official describes conversation with Hutchinson after bombshell testimony - CNN Video
articles.description: Alyssa Farah Griffin, Trump's former White House director of strategic communications, discusses how Cassidy Hutchinson is doing following her bombshell testimony to the Jan. 6 committee.

articles.title: Hutchinson was 1 of the witnesses Trump world sought to influence

articles.title: How the Supreme Court ruling will gut the EPA's ability to fight the climate crisis
articles.description: Experts tell CNN the EPA ruling is a major setback in the country's effort to rein in the climate crisis and its deadly, costly impacts.

articles.author: Rebekah Riess, Jennifer Henderson and Holly Yan, CNN
articles.title: After 43 days on the run, the woman accused of killing an elite cyclist was captured in Costa Rica
articles.description: Armstrong was wanted for the May 11 shooting of Anna Moriah "Mo" Wilson, who had previously dated Armstrong's boyfriend. Investigators say the killing may have been a violent act of romantic jealousy.
articles.content:
(CNN)The woman suspected of fatally shooting elite cyclist Anna Moriah "Mo" Wilson in Texas has been captured in Costa Rica, the US Marshals Office said Thursday.

articles.title: Polls find majority of Americans say country is heading in wrong direction
articles.description: The vast majority of Americans across party lines are unhappy with the state of the US, a new set of polling finds.

articles.title: Supreme Court tells lower courts to reconsider disputes on abortion and guns after blockbuster decisions

articles.title: Live updates: Russia's war in Ukraine
articles.description: NATO formally invited Finland and Sweden to join the military alliance during a summit in Madrid. Russian President Vladimir Putin said Moscow was not bothered by the move, but it would bring inevitable "tensions." Follow live updates here.
